product_name: Liberty Bottleworks Rimrock Bottle with Sport Top - 24 fl. oz.
long_description: Quench your thirst with a sip of cool water from the Rimrock Bottle with Sport Top from Liberty Bottleworks. Sport top opening with built-in straw gives you spill-free sipping while you're on the go. Just flip the valve up, tip the bottle and sip, or remove the cap entirely and drink straight from the bottle. Food-grade silicone O-ring in the cap limits leaks. Made in the United States from 100% recycled aluminum; all materials, including the food-grade polyester powder coat on the inside, are 100% BPA-free. Liberty Bottleworks Rimrock bottle with Sport Top holds 24 fl. oz. Hand washing recommended.
short_description: Quench your thirst with a sip of cool water from the Rimrock Bottle with Sport Top from Liberty Bottleworks. Sport top opening with built-in straw gives you spill-free sipping while you're on the go.
